languages.text: "Ты доказал{mf||а} свою преданность, а значит, отныне станешь моим новым пророком, Дитя Рассвета! Присягни же мне, Вог'Хайг'Самету, и склонись со своим культом передо мной. Тайны и знания, что ютятся на гранях забытья и несбывшегося грядущего, будут в твоем распоряжении... Но я зрю и другую тропу. Та, в которой я стану разящим оружием в руках Чемпиона Хаоса. Знай же, что обе тропы — та, где наши нити сплетаются, и та, где моя обрывается — приведут тебя к величию и восславят Истину Изначальную. Выбор за тобой".

"You have proven your loyalty, and so henceforth you will be my new prophet, Child of the Dawn! Now swear fealty to me, Vog'Haik'Sameth, as you and your cult bow before me. You will possess secrets and knowledge balanced on the brink of oblivion, on the edges of futures that never came to pass. But there is another path that I see. One in which I become a desolating weapon in the hands of the champion of Chaos. You should know that both paths — the one where our threads intertwine and the one where mine is cut short — will lead you to greatness and glorify the Primordial Truth. The choice is yours."
languages.original_text: "Ты доказал{mf||а} свою преданность, а значит, отныне станешь моим новым пророком, Дитя Рассвета! Присягни же мне, Вог'Хайг'Самету, и склонись со своим культом передо мной. Тайны и знания, что ютятся на гранях забытья и несбывшегося грядущего, будут в твоем распоряжении... Но я зрю и другую тропу. Та, в которой я стану разящим оружием в руках Чемпиона Хаоса. Знай же, что обе тропы — та, где наши нити сплетаются, и та, где моя обрывается — приведут тебя к величию и восславят Истину Изначальную. Выбор за тобой".

traits.locale_text: "You have proven your loyalty, and so henceforth you will be my new champion, Child of the Dawn! Now swear fealty to me, mortal. You will possess secrets and knowledge balanced on the brink of oblivion, on the edges of futures that never came to pass. But there is another path that I see. One in which I will only reveal a single secret to you, one so powerful that I can only tell it with my last breath. You should know that both paths — the one where our threads intertwine and the one where mine is cut short — will lead you to greatness and glorify the Primordial Truth. The choice is yours."

You should know that both paths — the one where our threads intertwine and the one where mine is cut short — will lead you to greatness and glorify the Primordial Truth. The choice is yours."

languages.text: “你已经证明了你的忠诚。从今以后，你将会成为我新的先知，黎明之子！向我宣誓效忠吧，沃格·希杰·萨梅斯，你和你的教派将会跪拜在我面前。你将拥有无数不为人知的秘密知识，你将游荡在湮灭边缘，游荡在从未出现过的无数未来之中。话虽如此，我却看到了另一条路。在这条道路上，我变成了混沌神选者手中毫无生气的武器。这两条路都摆在你面前，其中一条道路，会让我们的命运之线交织在一起，而在另一条路上，我的道路会就此截断。无论你踏上哪条路，都会引领你走向伟大，让原初真理得到赞颂。选择权在你手上。”
languages.original_text: "You have proven your loyalty, and so henceforth you will be my new prophet, Child of the Dawn! Now swear fealty to me, Vog'Haik'Sameth, as you and your cult bow before me. You will possess secrets and knowledge balanced on the brink of oblivion, on the edges of futures that never came to pass. But there is another path that I see. One in which I become a desolating weapon in the hands of the champion of Chaos. You should know that both paths — the one where our threads intertwine and the one where mine is cut short — will lead you to greatness and glorify the Primordial Truth. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: “你已经证明了你的忠诚。从今以后，你将会成为我新的先知，黎明之子！向我宣誓效忠吧，沃格·希杰·萨梅斯，你和你的教派将会跪拜在我面前。你将拥有无数不为人知的秘密知识，你将游荡在湮灭边缘，游荡在从未出现过的无数未来之中。话虽如此，我却看到了另一条路。在这条道路上，我变成了混沌神选者手中毫无生气的武器。这两条路都摆在你面前，其中一条道路，会让我们的命运之线交织在一起，而在另一条路上，我的道路会就此截断。无论你踏上哪条路，都会引领你走向伟大，让原初真理得到赞颂。选择权在你手上。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt Eure Loyalität bewiesen, daher werdet Ihr fortan mein neuer Prophet sein, Kind der Dämmerung! Und nun schwört mir die Treue, Vog'Haik'Sameth, nun da Ihr und Euer Kult vor mir kniet. Ihr werdet Geheimnisse und Wissen besitzen, die am Rande des Vergessens taumeln, und am Rande von Zukunften, die nie geworden sind. Doch ich sehe noch einen anderen Pfad. Einen Pfad, in dem ich eine zerstörerische Waffe in den Händen eines Champions des Chaos werde. Ihr solltet wissen, dass beide Pfade Euch zu wahrer Größe führen und die Primordiale Wahrheit verherrlichen – der Pfad, bei dem unsere Fäden sich verweben, und der Pfad, bei dem mein Faden gekappt wird. Ihr entscheidet."
languages.original_text: "You have proven your loyalty, and so henceforth you will be my new prophet, Child of the Dawn! Now swear fealty to me, Vog'Haik'Sameth, as you and your cult bow before me. You will possess secrets and knowledge balanced on the brink of oblivion, on the edges of futures that never came to pass. But there is another path that I see. One in which I become a desolating weapon in the hands of the champion of Chaos. You should know that both paths — the one where our threads intertwine and the one where mine is cut short — will lead you to greatness and glorify the Primordial Truth. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Eure Loyalität bewiesen, daher werdet Ihr fortan mein neuer Champion sein, Kind der Dämmerung! Und nun schwört mir die Treue, {mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche }. Ihr werdet Geheimnisse und Wissen besitzen, die am Rande des Vergessens taumeln, und am Rande von Zukunften, die nie geworden sind. Doch ich sehe noch einen anderen Pfad. Einen, auf dem ich Euch nur ein einziges Geheimnis anvertraue. Ein Geheimnis so mächtig, dass ich es nur mit meinem letzten Atemzug preisgeben kann. Ihr solltet wissen, dass beide Pfade Euch zu wahrer Größe führen und die Primordiale Wahrheit verherrlichen — der Pfad, bei dem unsere Fäden sich verweben, und der Pfad, bei dem mein Faden gekappt wird. Ihr entscheidet."

languages.text: «¡Has demostrado tu lealtad y, por tanto, te acepto como mi {mf|nuevo|nueva} profeta, Vástago del Amanecer! Ahora júrame lealtad a mí, a Vog'Haik'Sameth, e inclínate ante mí con tu secta. Poseerás secretos y conocimientos que se tambalean al filo del olvido, en los confines de futuros que ya nunca ocurrirán. Pero también veo otro camino. Uno en el que me convierto en un arma devastadora en manos de un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona} del Caos. Debes saber que ambos caminos, el primero en el que las hebras de nuestro destino están entrelazadas y el segundo en el que la mía se cercena de manera prematura, te conducirán a la grandeza para mayor gloria de la Verdad Primordial. La elección es tuya».
languages.original_text: "You have proven your loyalty, and so henceforth you will be my new prophet, Child of the Dawn! Now swear fealty to me, Vog'Haik'Sameth, as you and your cult bow before me. You will possess secrets and knowledge balanced on the brink of oblivion, on the edges of futures that never came to pass. But there is another path that I see. One in which I become a desolating weapon in the hands of the champion of Chaos. You should know that both paths — the one where our threads intertwine and the one where mine is cut short — will lead you to greatness and glorify the Primordial Truth. The choice is yours."

La elección es tuya».

languages.text: « Vous avez prouvé votre loyauté, aussi serez-vous {mf|mon nouveau prophète|ma nouvelle prophétesse}, enfant de l'Aube ! À présent, jurez fidélité à Vog'Haik'Sameth et inclinez-vous devant moi, vous et votre culte. Vous apprendrez des secrets et des connaissances qui sont conservés au bord du précipice de l'oubli, à l'horizon d'avenirs qui n'ont jamais eu lieu. Cependant, il existe une autre voie qui ferait de moi une arme dévastatrice entre les mains {mf|du champion|de la championne} du Chaos. Deux voies s'ouvrent donc à vous : celle où nos destins s'entrecroisent et celle où le mien est écourté. Quel que soit votre choix, sachez que vous accéderez à la grandeur et ferez la gloire de la Vérité Primordiale. À vous de décider. »
languages.original_text: "You have proven your loyalty, and so henceforth you will be my new prophet, Child of the Dawn! Now swear fealty to me, Vog'Haik'Sameth, as you and your cult bow before me. You will possess secrets and knowledge balanced on the brink of oblivion, on the edges of futures that never came to pass. But there is another path that I see. One in which I become a desolating weapon in the hands of the champion of Chaos. You should know that both paths — the one where our threads intertwine and the one where mine is cut short — will lead you to greatness and glorify the Primordial Truth. The choice is yours."

languages.text: 「お前は忠誠を証明した。今後は私の新たな予言者となるのだ、暁の子よ！さあ、私、ヴォッグ・ハイク・セイムスに忠誠を誓え。お前とその教団が我が前に誓ったように。お前は忘却の淵で、起こることのない未来の淵で秤にかけられた秘密と知識を持つことになる。だが、私には別の道が見える。その中の1つは、私が渾沌の英雄の手の中で、荒涼たる武器になるというものだ。私たちの糸が絡み合う道も、私の糸が断ち切られる道も、どちらもお前を偉大な存在へと導き、原初の真実を讃えるものである。選ぶのはお前自身だ」
languages.original_text: "You have proven your loyalty, and so henceforth you will be my new prophet, Child of the Dawn! Now swear fealty to me, Vog'Haik'Sameth, as you and your cult bow before me. You will possess secrets and knowledge balanced on the brink of oblivion, on the edges of futures that never came to pass. But there is another path that I see. One in which I become a desolating weapon in the hands of the champion of Chaos. You should know that both paths — the one where our threads intertwine and the one where mine is cut short — will lead you to greatness and glorify the Primordial Truth. The choice is yours."
